Articles.Content:
So as of right now my moon rover i'm making has to small of panels and just looks kind of silly. Does anyone know where I can find some that are bigger? I know a while ago I had some that were bigger but I have no idea where I got them from.

Those are the only panels I have and they are just to damn small =(

Then here are the bigger ones I use to have

Does anyone know where I can find these bigger panels?

Thanks a head of time!!

Those are panels from the Ion Hybrid Engine pack. It's also been updated for 0.21.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/0-18-ion-engine-pack/

Those are panels from the Ion Hybrid Engine pack. It's also been updated for 0.21.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/0-18-ion-engine-pack/

Thank you so much! Eve here I come!
